title: Textile, ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave; highly glazed
printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Thin, highly glazed chintz with a background of pale grey-blue showing large clusters of roses, other garden flowers and sprays of wheat in shades of rose, mauve, blue-green and pale yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1890.Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave; highly glazed
printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-35.
